body_html: This was somewhat intentional. There is no 'magic' to the 1.0 value, all that matters is that it's a number small enough that the dynamic range of the activations is sane. I also don't want to break backward compatibility since it's meant to be referred to in educational material.

body: This was somewhat intentional. There is no 'magic' to the 1.0 value, all that matters is that it's a number small enough that the dynamic range of the activations is sane. I also don't want to break backward compatibility since it's meant to be referred to in educational material.
